channel.title: [525] Pur3zscape
channel.description:
Credits: Ramsin and sol
Released why? Will we demoted on of our admin so instead of him releasing i decided that why should he take credit while he did not do shit so here it is. Also i quit RSPS shit.
[CENTER][SIZE="5"][COLOR="Red"]Pur3zscape 525 Revolution[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Features
[ul]High alch + low alch working Working Sounds Tele Block ~ [99%] Entangle ~ [90%] Clan Wars White Portal ~ [100%] Global Object Spawning ~ [100%] Split chat ~ [100%] Shoping main stock + player Stock ~ [95%] Server message every 60 seconds ~ [100%] ------------------- Magic with W/O Staff. ~ [75%] Blood barrage Shadow Barrage Smoke Barrage Ice Barrage Ice Burst Ice Blitz ------------------- Day mute ~ [100%] Hour Mute ~ [100%] Trading ~ [90%] Donater rank including yell ~ [100%] Bounty Hunter ~ [100%] Multi Pking ~ [100%] Working teletome ~ [100%] Working teleto ~ [100%] Working teleall ~ [100%] ------------------- Working ban ~ [100%] Working Mute ~ [100%] Working Kick ~ [100%] Working Unban ~ [100%] ------------------- Item On Item ~ [100%] Item On Objects ~ [100%] Magic On Item ~ [100%] ------------------- Edge PVP ~ [100%] Pk Points Gives random 1-5 ~ [100%] Good PVP drops ~ [100%] None spawnable items ~ [100%] Deaths Points ~ [100%] ------------------- Magic W/ Staff ~ [100%] Ice Barrage Blood Barrage Maismic Barrage AutoCast ~ [100%] ------------------- Working Veng + other lunar spells ~ [100%] Mage Bank ~ [100%] Banking ~ [100%] Deposit all ~ 78%] working emotes + skill Capes ~ [100%] Fixed Chat box ~ [100%] G maul Spec ~ [95%] Good Combat System ~ [85%] ------------------- Skills Mining ~ [95%] RuneCrafting ~ [95%] Fishing ~ [97%] WoodCutting ~ [93%] -------------------[/ul]
[FONT="Arial Black"][B]Upcoming Updates[/B][/FONT] Stoping nulls hope fully rune crafting item on item
[COLOR="Blue"]Videos: [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hJOynyia0HY"]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hJOynyia0HY[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VeBlSs3JJds"]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VeBlSs3JJds[/URL][/COLOR]
[FONT="Arial Black"][B]Coders[/B][/FONT] Ramsin Ddspure Sorcrystal
[/CENTER]
Application form:
[COLOR="Pink"]If apply for Graphixer: Name: Hour on a day: Doing Gfx for (time): Signature(signature of yours you made):[/COLOR]
[COLOR="YellowGreen"]If applying for Server Programmer: How long been Coding 525: What can you code?: How many hours are you online a day?: What base can you code?: Do you have a source released?: (if so please show me what you have got) Do you have a server of your own?: (if so please show me what you have got):[/COLOR]
[COLOR="DarkGreen"]If you are applying for Client Programmer: What can you code in 525 Clients?: Are you active?: how long have you been programming 525 Clients?:[/COLOR]
Pictures: [SIZE="3"]Trading[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-13_165433-1.png[/img]
[SIZE="3"]Fletching[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-21_000744.png[/img] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-21_000815.png[/img]
[SIZE="3"]Mining [/SIZE] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-18_095501-1.png[/img]
[SIZE="3"]Fishing[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-13_165452-1.png[/img]
[SIZE="3"]Shoping[/SIZE] (playerstock) [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-21_094426.png[/img] (mainstock) [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-21_094959.png[/img]
[SIZE="3"]working second shop (skilling)[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-21_094926.png[/img]
[SIZE="3"]Global Objects[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-21_094555.png[/img]
[SIZE="3"]Woodcutting[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-21_094733.png[/img]
[SIZE="3"]White portal[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-21_094801.png[/img]
[SIZE="3"]Split Chat[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-21_094828.png[/img]
[SIZE="3"]Magic with out staff[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-05_091314-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-05_091314_cr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2222.png[/img] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/54758.png[/img] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-04_122216.png[/img] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-05_091241.png[/img] [IMG]http://i439.photobucket.com/albums/qq120/ramsin_2008/2009-08-05_091314.png[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/332m6ba.jpg[/img]
Shops videos: [URL=http://"http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=saxxsm&s=3"]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=saxxsm&s=3[/URL]
Download link - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KK92I020
The real Pur3z release, instead of GGGGG's shitty advertise and Atomicscape release. I TAKE NO CREDITS OF THIS. ONLY POSTING THIS TO COMMUNITY IF SOME PEOPLE NEED.
